title-group.article-title: Parsers in Tutors: What Are They Good For?

abstract.p: This paper looks at the possibilities and limitations of parser-based language tutors. Our observations draw from a project by the U.S. Army Research Institute (ARI) to develop a German tutor, the BRIDGE, which revolves around a parser.
